item.description:
Arlington Helping Professionals Association AHPA

Meeting Thur Apr 7 - 12:00 noon to 2:00pm 

Fox Library, 175 Mass Ave., E. Arlington

Corner of Cleveland St. and Mass Ave

www.arlingtonhelpingprofessionals.org

Bring friends, network, get motivated!

Get Addicted To Success! Be a Center of Influence!

Dimitry Neyshtadt is a local area networker and self proclaimed "Success Addict" who helps families in the areas of financial planning in his full-time career. He will be speaking on items such as goal setting, how to be a center of influence, how to bring value to your communities, and in turn, benefit both personally and professionally from all of these actions.

Dimitry also volunteers on the Board of Directors of various nonprofits in the Greater Boston Area, including the Boston Main Streets Foundation and Summer Search Professional Network. Though his passion and drive are intense, he really is 'one of us'! And his presentation will help motivate and speak on how to blend community activism with personal and professional development, relationship building, and SUCCESS!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the Library - ask any of the employees to find us!
item.why: This will be a networking and educational meeting for business professionals in the Greater Boston Area. All industries are welcome to attend! In fact, you should bring a friend! This will be a motivational afternoon meet and greet!
item.name: Arlington Helping Professionals Networking Mtg- Thur Apr 7 - 12noon - 2pm
